body: I pushed through the door and burst out into the night before she could manage another sound. As soon as I was out, I took in a deep breath of the night air as I fled, with the smell of humidity and buzz of the night insects engulfing me. Briefly turning around to see if she followed me, I saw no one. I was free.

options.true: As I slowed my pace, I saw someone <CHOICE(0)>  me down from a distance.
options.false: When I finally made it to my car, I slammed the front door, locked it, and leaned back in my seat until I slumped down, exhausted. Opening my eyes to look out of the water-stained front window, I saw only a hint of the library in the distance. That reminded me to take out my phone, go to my contacts, and block <CHOICE(1)>
